snippet.title: Among Us 3D - Little Game (SFM Animation)
snippet.description:
I want to address some things about this video:
-The song choice. 
I know that the song is about gender roles, stereotypes and I am very well aware about it. I personally love the song and the message it conveyed. I tend to change or twist the idea of the song / lyrics, so it would go with my ideas / animation. (In this case, some parts of the song didn‚Äôt really go along, but I had to somehow go around some lyrics)

-Why there isn‚Äôt much to it?
SFM is a super limited program. So I cannot do crazy stuff just like in Blender (or any other program) and I do not have props / maps for this game. So I have to scavenge or think how certain things could‚Äôve worked out.

-Why it‚Äôs in 3d?
I specialize in it. (I know it is not a super puper dupper stunning visual animation, but I tried)

-Why the video is dark themed? / Why there is no good ending?
If you will watch my past animations, they are mostly dark themed. Idk, there are lots of funny videos of Among Us. My humor can be garbage or ‚Äúmore boomer‚Äù like, so I am just going to make something what I can do. I‚Äôm not inventing bike a new ‚ÄòxD

-Will there be more Among Us animations?
I might think of something. As ‚ÄúFNAF Security Breach‚Äù was announced, I want to make a test video (some short video) and then maybe I can do something about Among Us? I personally loved to animate something else than FNAF and BATIM, plus, it was easy to animate these little creatures. In short - Stay on alert of straw polls / updates on my YT community page.

-Some parts of the animation doesn‚Äôt make sense / doesn‚Äôt go with the games logic.
I know, my fault. Didn‚Äôt thought it through as it was meant to be a silly project and I didn‚Äôt want to go back and rethink it again ^^‚Äù

-NO MORE FNAF!?!
I-   My whole channel is about it .-. Of course there will be more content about it. It tends to be repetitive when you make 55+ animation, which are 2-5 min long. (I have planned +20 projects, + 1 reboot of one series, + 30 other songs, which needs to be still planned) I still have so much to do‚Ä¶ yikes. I get that most of my subscribers are here for FNAF and I do not mind making animations about, but a slight switch is sooo refreshing. For example, eating the same bread for a yearlong will not make it taste better. You get bored of it.

-Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏é
Thank you for letting me do something besides FNAF and BATIM. It is motivating when people watch my stuff. I‚Äôve been overwhelmed from the support you all brought upon me, but it also brought my motivation for animations. So really, thank you all for being awesome!!

-How can we support you?
It‚Äôs not obligated to do, but I would really appreciate if you would follow my social media and just simply watch my stuff on YouTube (Ofc, check out the music creators! Their music inspire me to make animations / stories ‚ù§Ô∏é) If you really, reaaaally want to support me materially, then I have a channels membership option. Starting from Golden Tier, you can access my discord server ^^‚Äù

Forgot to say!!! Thanks to @Teqlor1 for editing the model of Among Us üíú

~‚ù§Ô∏éChannel Members‚ù§Ô∏é~
Shawn Denise Coley
the afton family aftons
Teqlor1
Dragonalf'animations
JengoLiam
MimiPeach
~‚ù§Ô∏é~‚ù§Ô∏é~‚ù§Ô∏é~‚ù§Ô∏é~‚ù§Ô∏é~‚ù§Ô∏é~‚ù§Ô∏é~


üåê My Social Media / Sites üåê
üéÄFaceBook: https://www.facebook.com/Xboxgamerk-111000877384031/
üéÄInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/xboxgamerk/
üéÄTwitter: https://twitter.com/kravale_katrina
üéÄTikTok: https://vm.tiktok.com/ZSae3FKU/
üéÄSteam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/xboxgamerk/
üéÄTwitch: https://www.twitch.tv/xboxgamerk
üéÄDA: http://xboxgamerk.deviantart.com/
üéÄVK: https://vk.com/katrinakr
üö´I DO NOTüö´ own any groups anymore, so please, be careful for fake ones!!!

üö´DO NOT RE-UPLOAD!üö´ You can do something creative out of it. If you want to use it full then please contact me on YouTube.

‚ñ†ORIGINAL SONG‚ñ† https://youtu.be/WNr3x1kVVEc

‚ñ†Outro song‚ñ† Ahxello - Forever

‚ñ†Models‚ñ† by:
Among Us - Lenoax
Among Us (not alive) - ALIEN31[ITA]
Map (Model) - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2128928631

‚ñ†PROGRAMS‚ñ† I used: 
SFM Source Filmmaker
Clip Studio Paint for redoing pictures
Sony Vegas Pro 16 for montage all parts together


THIS WAS MADE IN 16 DAYS (~106 hours in total)
~Enjoy!~

#Among_Us #XboxGamerK #Animations
